name: Space Migration
description:
Information: This is "Space Migration" by Nolan Sadowski. It was made in C++ using OpenFrameworks.

This is part of a "Game A Week" project, in which I will make one game a week centered around a randomly selected topic.

This game is for Week #1. The topic this week was a one button game. 

I do not own the rights to this music in this game. This song is a royalty free song titled "The White" by rolemusic.
Here is their info: http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com

Objective: Fly through space and take photos of the planets that you pass by using your camera. Be weary of the fake outs by asteroids and be aware of that your camera has a quick cool down!

Controls: There is only one button to worry about! 

Hold space on the title screen to start the game.

Press space in game to take a photo.
